name: Coral Connect
description:
Connect bubbles one by one by moving your finger across the screen to make them disappear and free the Coral’s friends. Form groups of three or more neighbouring bubbles of the same color to burst them.
Download and play now!


FEATURES

• Infinite Challenging Levels 
• Easy to play and simple to use
• Designed for both Tablets and Phones
• Beautiful and simple graphics
• Relaxing game, there is no time to solve it.


TIPS

• Tap the screen and connect bubbles of the same colour one by one.
• Release the drag to make the bubbles burst and free the Coral’s friends.
•  Form groups of seven or more neighbouring bubbles, it gives you a Pearl.
• Touching a Pearl, makes all the neighbouring bubbles burst.
• In order to pass from one level to another you have to free all the Coral’s friends.
• At the top of the screen you will find a Seashell, a Power up that is activated when is full of water.
• Touching the activated Seashell makes all the bubbles burst.
• You can restart the game by pressing the icon from the lower bar.
• You can turn the sound or music on or off from the lower bar.
